data: The note "API Integration Technical Spec" defines endpoints for user authentication and data retrieval.
The note "API Integration Technical Spec" specifies the user authentication endpoint at /api/login.
The note "API Integration Technical Spec" specifies the data retrieval endpoint at /api/data.
The note "API Integration Technical Spec" requires the development team to implement an OAuth2 flow.
The note "API Integration Technical Spec" requires the quality assurance team to draft test cases for the defined API endpoints.
The note "API Integration Technical Spec" schedules a security review in the next sprint as a follow-up.
The note "API Integration Technical Spec" is marked as high priority and tagged with technical and urgent to indicate immediate implementation needs.
